name: Kemperbad, On the Ropes - A WFRP Adventure
name_original: Kemperbad, On the Ropes - A WFRP Adventure
description:
A trade rivalry between organised crime in Kemperbad, a heretical Sigmarite cult, and a secret shrine beneath the Kemperbad main lift winch-house all come together to make a straightforward task for mob-boss Luigi Belladonna very much more complicated than was advertised! A short Warhammer Fantasy Role Play  4th Edition one-shot scenario suitable for 1st or 2nd level PCs. Can be inserted into “Death on the Reik” at times when the town is visited. It can also be used to introduce the heretical non-chaotic cults to your campaign. Playable over 1-2 sessions.

This is an unofficial fan publication and is totally unauthorised by Cubicle 7, Games Workshop and any other organisation. It is available totally free as a fan tribute.
